choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
Here's your daily dietary intake, which is about 2000 calories:
Breakfast (1 cup of coffee or tea):- You drink coffee every morning to help you wake up and feel more alert throughout the day.
Lunch:- A balanced meal with protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates. Include a variety of foods such as salmon, tuna, chicken, beef, pork, lamb, duck, goose, or other game birds. Add some nuts like almond for crunch.
Dinner:- A three-course meal with an appetizer, entree, and dessert. Include fruits (apples, bananas) and vegetables (carrots, curiously named "vegetable").
Snacks:- Include healthy snacks like fruit leather, granola bars, trail mix, or other savory or sweet treats. Add some nuts like almonds for crunch. Serve with a small cup of unsweetened cacao to balance the bitterness of dark chocolate.
Dessert:- Include desserts made from fresh fruits (watermelon, honeydew, cantaloupe), dried fruits (apricot, raisin), nuts (hazelnut, almond, pecan), and other sweet or savory treats.
Beverages:- Include juice (orange, apples, grapefruit), tea (green tea, black coffee), or other beverages like soy milk, almond milk.
